aboutPage.title: This is HypeHaat
aboutPage.subtitle: We are passionate about bringing you the best products that blend technology, style, and functionality.
aboutPage.missionText: To provide an unparalleled shopping experience by offering a curated selection of high-quality products, exceptional customer service, and a seamless online platform. We believe in innovation, quality, and putting our customers first.
aboutPage.storyText: Founded in 2023, HypeHaat started as a project by a group of tech enthusiasts who wanted to share their passion. We've grown into a trusted online retailer, but our core values of quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction remain the same. We are dedicated to helping you find products that enhance your life.
aboutPage.qualityText: We handpick and test every product to ensure it meets our high standards of quality and performance.
aboutPage.shippingText: We offer fast and reliable shipping across Bangladesh to get your new items to you quickly.
aboutPage.supportText: Our friendly support team is always ready to help you with any questions or issues you may have.

adminImportPage.subtitle: Easily import products from CJdropshipping. Just paste a product URL below and let our AI do the work.
adminImportPage.howItWorksText: For security reasons, our AI cannot visit external links. Instead, it intelligently analyzes the text within the URL you provide to understand the product type. It then creatively generates brand new, realistic product data (name, description, images, price) for you to review and add to your store.
